title: Multi-Viewport Emulator
description: Simultaneous preview frames with independent viewport settings and configurable props

requirements.title: Multi-Frame Support
requirements.description: Support simultaneous preview frames with independent viewport settings (desktop, mobile, tablet presets)
notes: Independent viewport settings per frame (width, height, zoom)
Presets for desktop, tablet, popular phone sizes

requirements.title: Per-Frame Props Configuration
requirements.description: Support different props/variants per emulator frame with persistent settings per component
notes: Each frame can have different props/variants
Use cases: dark/light mode, different states
